headline: Usher Agro's director Ajay Sharma resigns
description: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that Mr. Ajay Sharma, Non Executive Nominee Director has tendered his resignation from the directorship of the company with effect from the August 22, 2017.
articleBody: Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that Mr. Ajay Sharma, Non Executive Nominee Director has tendered his resignation from the directorship of the company with effect from the August 22, 2017.Source : BSE

headline: Usher Agro's board meeting on February 14, 2017
description: Usher Agro Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on February 14, 2017, inter alia, to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter ended December 31, 2016.
articleBody: Usher Agro Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on February 14, 2017, inter alia, to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter ended December 31, 2016.Further, the Trading Window for the purpose of transacting in the Company's shares will remain closed with effect from February 03, 2017 till the expiry of 48 hours after the declaration of financial results.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Usher Agro

headline: Usher Agro's board meeting on December 08, 2016
description: Usher Agro Ltd has informed BSE that a Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held at Short Notice on December 08, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the allotment of equity shares to the lenders in pursuance of invocation of SDR Scheme.

headline: Usher Agro's compliance officer Swati Maheshwari resigns
description: Usher Agro Ltd has informed that IDBI Bank has withdrawn the Nomination of Mr. Narayanan Krishnan and in his place appointed Ms. Baljinder Kaur Mandal as Nominee Director of the Company with effect from June 29, 2013. Further the Company has also inform that Ms. Swati Maheshwari has resigned as Compliance Officer the Company.
articleBody: Usher Agro Ltd has informed BSE that IDBI Bank has withdrawn the Nomination of Mr. Narayanan Krishnan and in his place appointed Ms. Baljinder Kaur Mandal as Nominee Director of the Company with effect from June 29, 2013.Further the Company has also inform that Ms. Swati Maheshwari has resigned as Compliance Office the Company.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Usher Agro

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Buy Usher Agro; target of Rs 46: Firstcall Research
description: Firstcall Research is bullish on Usher Agro and has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target of Rs 46 in its April 6, 2013 research report.
articleBody: Firstcall Research is bullish on Usher Agro and has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target of Rs 46 in its April 6, 2013 research report.&amp;nbsp;“Usher Agro Limited, an agro-processing company, engages in the milling, processing, and sale of basic food products in India. The company primarily focuses on non-basmati rice and wheat products. Its rice products include raw rice, brown rice, and part boiled/steamed rice; and wheat products comprise whole meal aata, Raata, rawa/ semolina, white flour, and choker. The company exports its products primarily to the Middle East and Gulf countries. It is also developing a 16 MW power plant for the generation of bio-mass power. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Mumbai, India.” &amp;nbsp;“Usher Agro Limited, an agro-processing company, engages in the milling, processing, and sale of basic food products in India, reported its financial results for the quarter ended 31 Dec, 2012. Usher Agro Ltd achieved a turnover of Rs. 2489.08 million for the 2nd quarter of the current year 2012-13 as against Rs. 2086.19 millions in the corresponding quarter of the previous year. The company has reported an EBITDA of Rs. 336.53 millions and a net profit of Rs. 137.32 million against Rs. 116.47 million reported respectively in the corresponding quarter of the previous year. The company has reported an EPS of Rs. 3.61 for the 2nd quarter as against an EPS of Rs. 3.06 in the corresponding quarter of the previous year.” &amp;nbsp;“At the current market price of Rs.40.85, the stock P/E ratio is at 2.92 x FY13E and 2.40 x FY14E respectively. Earning per share (EPS) of the company for the earnings for FY13E and FY14E is seen at Rs.13.99 and Rs.16.99 respectively. Net Sales and PAT of the company are expected to grow at a CAGR of 28 percent and 22 percent over 2011 to 2014E respectively. On the basis of EV/EBITDA, the stock trades at 1.15 x for FY13E and 0.97 x for FY14E. Price to Book Value of the stock is expected to be at 0.48 x and 0.40 x respectively for FY13E and FY14E. We expect that the company surplus scenario is likely to continue for the next three years, will keep its growth story in the coming quarters also. We recommend ‘BUY’ in this particular scrip with a target price of Rs 46 for medium to long term investment,” says Firstcall Research report. Non-Institutions holding more than 90% in Indian cos  Disclaimer: The views and investment tips expressed by investment experts/broking houses/rating agencies on moneycontrol.com are their own, and not that of the website or its management. Moneycontrol.com advises users to check with certified experts before taking any investment decisions.

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Usher Agro to increase capacity of rice &amp; allied products, pulse milling, pulse flour milling
description: Usher Agro has taken up capacity expansion / new products projects, Rice &amp; Allied Products capacity to 486000MTPA, Pulse Milling capacity to 105600MTPA and Pulse Flour Milling capacity to 23100MTPA. After completion of above project the Company will be able to increase its total Rice Milling capacity to more than 1 Million MTPA.
articleBody: Usher Agro Ltd has informed BSE that the Company has taken up following capacity expansion / new products projects :Particulars : Rice &amp; Allied ProductsCapacity : 486000MTPALocation : Chhata, Dist. Mathura, U.P.Particulars : Pulse MillingCapacity : 105600MTPALocation : Chhata, Dist. Mathura, U.P.Particulars : Pulse Flour MillingCapacity : 23100MTPALocation : Chhata, Dist. Mathura, U.P.After completion of above project the Company will be able to increase its total Rice Milling capacity to more than 1 Million MTPA and also having processing facility of all types of pulses i.e. Pigeon Peas, Chick Peas, Red Lentils, Yellow Peas and Moong beans to emerge as 'complete basic food processor' i.e. Rice, Wheat Products and Pulses to be as a one stop solution all basic food requirements.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Usher Agro

headline: Usher Agro fixes book closure for Dividend &amp; AGM from Dec 17 to Dec 21
description: Usher Agro fixes book closure for Dividend &amp; AGM from Dec 17 to Dec 21
articleBody: Usher Agro Ltd has informed BSE that the Register of Members &amp; Share Transfer Books of the Company will remain closed from December 17, 2012 to December 21, 2012 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of Payment of Dividend &amp; 16th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Company to be held on December 21, 2012.The Dividend, if declared will be payable on December 27, 2012.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Usher Agro
